G2

  • A2
  • E2
  • G3

What is the connection between algebra and geometry, and how can we exploit it?

Teacher Support

Key Questions

  1. What do we mean by Cartesian coordinates?

  2. How can we describe circles and lines (in two dimensions) algebraically?

  3. How can we consider parallel and perpendicular lines using algebra?

  4. How can we use algebra to find the intersections of geometric objects?

  • Carefully designed set of problems - Matching circles and equations

  • Fluency exercises - Diamond collector
  • Lucky dip - Parabella
